title: Sampie Mastriet
text:
Sampie Mastriet (born 3 August 1990) is a South African professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, who most recently played with the in the domestic <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> competition. His usual position is <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Wing">wing</a>.
Career.
After representing the at several youth tournaments, he joined the in 2010.
He made his first team debut for the Blue Bulls in the <a href="2011%20Vodacom%20Cup">2011 Vodacom Cup</a> against his former team . He made several appearances in this competition over the next two seasons and made his <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> debut in the <a href="2012%20Currie%20Cup%20Premier%20Division">2012 Currie Cup Premier Division</a> against the .
He also played for in the <a href="2009%20Varsity%20Cup">2009</a> and <a href="2010%20Varsity%20Cup">2010</a> <a href="Varsity%20Cup">Varsity Cup</a> competitions.
In 2013, he was included in the squad for the <a href="2013%20Rugby%20World%20Cup%20Sevens">2013 Rugby World Cup Sevens</a>.
Mastriet moved across the <a href="Jukskei%20River">Jukskei River</a> to join the for 2015.
